ygData.subject: Re: A Review of Activation Functions in SharpNEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: Colin, I ve also seen in my research that using zero-centered, linear type activation functions like ReLUs, Leaky ReLUs, and ELUs perform well. Glad you ve
